org.codehaus.cargo.container.wildfly

Interface WildFlyPropertySet

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JBossPropertySet

    public interface WildFlyPropertySet
extends JBossPropertySet
    Gathers all WildFly properties.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String CLI_EMBEDDED_SCRIPT
      External CLI script file paths.
      Used for custom configuration of WildFly container in embedded mode.

      Example usage:
      setProperty("cargo.wildfly.script.cli.embedded.journal", "target/test-classes/wildfly/wildfly10/jms-journal.cli")
      static String CLI_OFFLINE_SCRIPT
      External CLI script file paths.
      Used for custom configuration of WildFly container in offline mode.

      Example usage:
      setProperty("cargo.wildfly.script.cli.offline.journal", "target/test-classes/wildfly/wildfly10/jms-journal.cli")

      • Fields inherited from interface org.codehaus.cargo.container.jboss.JBossPropertySet

        ALTERNATIVE_DEPLOYMENT_DIR, ALTERNATIVE_MODULES_DIR, CLI_ONLINE_SCRIPT, CLUSTERED, CONFIGURATION, JBOSS_AJP_PORT, JBOSS_CLASSLOADING_WEBSERVICE_PORT, JBOSS_EJB3_REMOTING_PORT, JBOSS_INVOKER_POOL_PORT, JBOSS_JMX_PORT, JBOSS_JRMP_INVOKER_PORT, JBOSS_JRMP_PORT, JBOSS_MANAGEMENT_HTTP_PORT, JBOSS_MANAGEMENT_NATIVE_PORT, JBOSS_NAMING_PORT, JBOSS_OSGI_HTTP_PORT, JBOSS_REMOTING_TRANSPORT_PORT, JBOSS_TRANSACTION_RECOVERY_MANAGER_PORT, JBOSS_TRANSACTION_STATUS_MANAGER_PORT, PROFILE, REMOTEDEPLOY_HOSTNAME, REMOTEDEPLOY_PORT
